name: Car Racing Game for Toddlers and Kids
name_original: Car Racing Game for Toddlers and Kids
description:
Car Racing game for young kids and toddlers

if your children love all things cars and racing, then this is a game which they will love. a simple car racing game for young children and toddlers between the age of 2 and 7. big buttons make it easy for the child to play the game, including the horn, jump, music accelerate and brake. no difficult obstacles so the child can always reach the end of the level. the car wont flip!

There is 28 Cars to choose from, earn simple coins in game to get new cars. and 10 levels of jumping hill climb fun in this kids racing game.

Pop the balloons as every kid loves at the end of each race to earn more coins!

toddler car games helps your child understand the educational mechanics of using mobile and tablet devices.

Features:
* 28 cars to choose from
* Fun and HD graphics
* 5 different kids music sound tracks for the child to switch between.
* Cute car, engine, horn sounds
* Balloon pop game at the end of each race.
+ much more.
